p: Year wise analysis of influenza activity revealed no case of Influenza A(H1N1)pdm09 in 2011 and 2014, whereas only one case was found positive during the years 2013 and 2016. Month wise break up showed highest number of positive cases admitted in the months of August during the respective years with larger case load i.e. in 2010, 2015 and 2017 ( Fig.Â 2). Apart from this a shorter peak was observed during the month of March in 2015.
